reviewText:
very poor quality.poor sound poor picture Danish edition. Daaveedee not interested in my complaint about everything being in foreign writing. Even when you start playing dvd still foreign until you click on swedish menu then soundtrack begins in english-!up to that point you have no idea it is an english soundtrack. As I say Daaveedee showed no interest in my complaint etc etc.
Terrible soundtrack and terrible picture. I threw it in the rubbish bin.
I shall not have any future dealings with Daaveedee-not that they seem to care anyway !

Vic Savage

It took me a while to figure out how to get rid of the subtitles. I really enjoyed this miniseries. If you have a universal player, go ahead and purchase this. The picture is not the best, but it is acceptable. The sound is very good. It is too bad we cant get more of the old miniseries on dvd.
